rooms.name: Main Living Area
rooms.description: Large open plan living-dining area with ample natural light and green walls. Incorporates eco-friendly materials and a sustainable design that aligns with Vastu principles by having the entrance in the southeast direction.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Soundproof room with eco-friendly insulation and energy-efficient LED lighting. Designed to provide a premium viewing experience in line with sustainable design practices.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and a dedicated recycling center. Designed in accordance with local building norms and Vastu for food preparation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with natural light and eco-friendly materials. Placed in the north-west for Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Functional living space for servants with basic amenities and separate access to maintain privacy. Designed in accordance with local norms.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose guest room that can also serve as a study or meditation space. Aligns with Vastu by being located in the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the main living area or adjacent to the kitchen. Uses eco-friendly materials and natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance designed for easy accessibility and energy efficiency. Placed in the southeast direction as per Vastu guidelines.
Multiple strategically placed windows to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy. Energy-efficient glazing installed.
Internal doors made from reclaimed wood connecting various rooms to maintain the eco-friendly design theme.
